resources.string: Enter your secret message, and click next when you\'re done. Press the menu button for help!
Record your voice message. Your text message will be hidden inside this recording. It must be long enough to encode all of the data!
Your message embedded successfully! You can now share it, listen to it, and check that the information is extracted correctly.
Select a contact group to send your message to. You can add more groups from your Google account online.
seconds of audio left to record
You can stop recording when you are ready
The audio file was not long enough to embed your message. Please try again.
Failed to decrypt the embedded data. Enter a new key phrase to try again or cancel.
This will overwrite the key you already have stored.
Your recording was not long enough, please record another message.
Please enter your Dropbox password. This will not be saved.
Does it work (is the message you get when you click Test Extracting Data the same as the one you typed in)? Please send feedback using the link in the menu!
To decode a message, open (or Preview) it from your email or file browser program and choose to open it with StegDroid.
